Layer.onSearchPrevFocusable

Function/Meaning
Search backward for focusable layers
Type
Event of the Layer class
Syntax
onSearchPrevFocusable(layer)
Arguments
layer The layer object that receives focus.
Specify this as an argument when calling the method of the same name in the parent class.
If null is passed, it is processed as if there are no focusable layers.
Description
This event occurs when searching backward for focusable layers.
To specify the layer that receives focus, pass that layer as an argument to the superclass event of the same name.
